attributes.action: Shorten this summer's school holiday to allow for 'catch up' on the school year
attributes.additional_details:
School pupils have missed so much of the school year, and it's only right that they should be given the opportunity to have that time re-paid.
For many, the 6 week holiday is already enduring and, with children having missed so much school already, many a family/ pupil would happily wish to take advantage of a 'summer school'. Those that don't wish to, can remain at home.
attributes.background: Cancel or shorten the school summer holidays of 2020, to allow for pupils to 'catch up' on the missing weeks of term-time - due to the closure of schools in the pandemic. (This should not be mandatory and children can remain absent. The school should also seek a volunteer staff team if needed)
